executable.title: SFLS SulciSeg
executable.description: Sparse-Field Levelset Sulci Segmentation. Given some initial points in polydata will construct a contour and evolve it to high mean-curvature areas, returning the interior region indices.

parameters.label: Input Parameters
parameters.description: The inputs for the contour initialization and poly data

geometry.name: InputSurface
geometry.description: The filename of the input vtk polydata file for the surface.
geometry.label: Input Surface

point.name: ContourSeedPts
point.label: Contour Points
point.description: The initialization points in x,y,z coords where the contour is seeded initially. Warning: there are topological restrictions, see the documentation.

file.name: OutputFilename
file.description: Name of the output data file.
file.label: Output Filename
